title: Report cites trend of tech workers moving from traditional hubs to 'Zoom towns' (MSN) - Staffing Industry Analysts
content: Report cites trend of tech workers moving from traditional hubs to 'Zoom towns' (MSN)  Staffing Industry Analysts
description: The pandemic is likely shifting the tech jobs landscape away from traditional tech hubs in the US to midsize, more affordable cities dubbed “Zoom towns,” according to a story by MSN that cites a report from the Brookings Institute.
